segments.text: Whoa, I wasn't expecting to see a sink overflowing in such a normal kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right in front, drying a plate with a towel, totally zoned in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, but she hasn't reacted at all—crazy!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden outside, all calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the kids on the left side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy's climbing a stool to the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling; that's unexpected for cookie grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, reaching with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl's there, arm up, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats while mom's oblivious—such a surprise twist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene contrasts so much with the peaceful yard view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I had no idea this was happening behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR
